query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.welcome_message, p.input_placeholder, 
       d.domain_name, d.is_published, d.persona_id as bound_persona_id
FROM persona p
LEFT JOIN domain_order d ON d.persona_id = p.id AND d.is_published = 1
ORDER BY p.id
